traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: The adept can move through the space of a medium of larger creature.

traits.name: Brave
entries: The adept has advantage on any saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the adept's next turn.

actions.name: Dart
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
